remarks: The volume of the limit of an increasing sequence of measurable sets is the limit of the volumes.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
volsup $p |- ( ( F : NN --> dom vol /\ A. n e. NN ( F ` n ) C_ ( F ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) -> ( vol ` U. ran F ) = sup ( ( vol " ran F ) , RR* , < ) ) $.
$d F n $.
